titles.title: A bill to make foreign nationals ineligible for certain agricultural program loans, payments, or benefits, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Makes foreign nationals (including foreign-controlled corporations) ineligible for agricultural price supports, loans, crop insurance, and disaster payments. Prohibits all producers from producing nonprogram crops on set-aside acreage. States that for purposes of agricultural payment limitations a corporation stockholder with more than a 20 percent ownership interest shall not be considered a separate person from such corporation.
